examples: The group of close friends supported each other as they went through the problems of growing up.

images.alt: Photo of someone holding a small child's hand.
images.description: Someone helping a small child balance by holding their hand.
images.caption: Holding hands supports the small child to balance on the log.

meanings.definition: Someone who is hurt, injured, or killed by a person, group, or event.
examples: They were victims of unfair treatment by others.

images.alt: Photo of fist in the foreground and person sitting on the ground.
images.description: A person stands with a clenched fist in the foreground. A person sits with head down and hands over head in the background.
images.caption: Victims can be hurt physically, through words, or other actions.

source.title: Man in Yellow Shirt and Blue Denim Jeans
source.author: Karolina Grabowska

examples: Her life was at risk when she climbed the cliff without any ropes.

meanings.definition: Having to do with the body.
examples: She did hard physical training to prepare for the race.

meanings.definition: To be unhappy or in low spirits.
examples: I am depressed because of the gloomy weather.

images.alt: Photo of person sitting on the floor with head down.
images.description: A person sits alone, on the floor. The person's head is down. The person's arms are crossed and are resting on the person's bent knees.
images.caption: Sometimes when you feel depressed, you feel completely alone.
